data.text: @Mercede10827748 @CBCToronto It’s sad ppl like you don’t check out the actual data

@CBCToronto Lol to any place keeping these rules in place that don't work, just to look morally superior for the boosted vaxers so they can get on their high horse about only going out to Vax pass establishments 😂. All those businesses will fall and the ones that welcome all will thrive 🥳

@CBCToronto I’m in favour of vaccine passports (3 doses fully vaccinated).   Tim Hortons flip flopped, now dropping passports. My $ will ONLY go where passports will be req’d.  Restaurants can choose which client they want spending $$ at their establishment.
@CBCToronto Could ways do what they did in 1883. This is peanuts crumbs compared to that.

@MrCanSays @CBCToronto Sure, if there are businesses that stopped listening to science (that of CDC, WHO etc to be more precise) and want to enforce something that’s no longer recommended by the same scientists that introduced it, then their choice. It’s a free country, right?

@CBCToronto Given how well boosters are working you’re down to two options
